title: ArianeGroup Already Working to Secure IRIS2 Launch Contract
summary:
ArianeGroup CEO Martin Sion stated on 10 January that discussions regarding a launch contract for the European Union’s IRIS2 secure communications megaconstellation must begin in 2025, emphasizing the need for an agreement to be reached quickly.
